Cottage Cheese Taco Dressing


Ingredients
1 cup cottage cheese
1/2 cup salsa
1/8 teaspoon taco seasoning

Cooking Instructions

Place cottage cheese, salsa, and taco seasoning in the bowl
of a food processor or blender. Blend until smooth.
Source 

https://www.allrecipes.com/cottage-cheese-taco-dressing-recipe-8660729 

Reference Video 

https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=Cottage Cheese Taco Dressing
